about cascade

The Process Of Delivering-Certainty

We are a global leader in Analysis, Testing and Inspection Services.

With over 70 years worth of experience cumulatively in the analytical services industry, we have worked with our customers to bring the highest quality analysis to research teams across the globe. Having started as Cascade Scientific Ltd. in the late 1980s, our team has played part in some of the major commercial projects, spanning over the last four decades. Your research, process development and production are important to us and we want you to keep your competitive advantage, which is why our ethos as a company is to strive for the highest quality analysis and consultation in the market whilst also keeping complete confidentiality to our clients. We will work as part of your team.
